lines.text: There weren't any spent bullet casings in the ash pile...
And no footprints or anything, either.
I guess maybe we could use the ash to dust for prints on the gun?
The gun was caught in the flame along with Slick, s-so... well.
Fingerprints are the residue left by- by skin oil, and that oil would've burned away.
Oh. Dang. I guess... that's another reason they started the fire, maybe?
And we can't use the ash to dust for prints, thanks to the fire.
